amendment.description: To continue in effect a provision of the Department of Defense Appropriations Act, 2003, relating to evaluations of creditworthiness for issuance of Government charge cards.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1316 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1316 proposed by Senator Inouye for Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S9566-9569; text: CR S9567) To continue in effect a provision of the Department of Defense Appropriations Act, 2003, relating to evaluations of creditworthiness for issuance of Government charge cards.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1316 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1316 proposed by Senator Inouye for Senator Byrd.
